title: Installation issue: perl hangs during configuration phase
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install perl

...
# goes to step configure and hangs indefinitely
==> 263189: perl: Executing phase: 'configure'
```

the same goes with exact version, I tried perl@5.30.3, perl@5.30.3, perl@5.28.0
